title: AE/PR/PS/达芬奇/OFX影视后期特效插件 Digital Film Tools-Tiffen Dfx 4.0v12
author: 大众脸
content: Tiffen Dfx 是一款拥有完整独立界面的特效插件，包含超过2000种滤镜特效效果，例如玻璃过滤器、特殊镜头、专业光效、胶片颗粒、色彩校正、抠像等。该插件可轻松在各类软件中调用，能够模拟并调节出多种电影质感效果，广泛应用于专业摄影、电影制作、视频编辑和视觉特效领域。
supported_versions: Adobe Photoshop CS5 – CC 2015.5, Adobe Photoshop Elements 9 and up (Non-app store version), Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 3 and up, Adobe After Effects CS5 – CC 2015.3, Adobe Premiere Pro CS5 – CC 2015.3, Avid Editing Systems (64 Bit versions only), Assimilate Scratch v8 and up, Black Magic Resolve v11 and up, Black Magic Resolve Lite v11 and up, The Foundry’s Nuke v8 and up, Sony Vegas v13 and up

download_links.name: 影视后期特效插件 Digital Film Tools-Tiffen Dfx 4.0v12

related_resources.name: 影视后期特效插件 Digital Film Tools: Tiffen Dfx 4.0v11 CE Bundles

other.installation_note: 插件为一键安装版，安装即可使用
